title: New Health Bars
body: I in my opinion don't like the new health bars. I know league has added many things or gimmicks to the new health bars but the look of it is very bad and it has a slower healing and damaging. i think they should make options for using the hp bars or not. The gimmicks don't help me either in any way. I might get used to it eventually but pls make a option to go to the old health bar

replies.body: Damage is actually quicker than it used to be and healing is still instantaneous. LMK how you feel as you get used to the visual changes.

Can you give red and blue buff more Jungle-y health borders instead of golden ones? Like maybe Red's could be wooden with ferns and hints of red while Blue's would be stone with blue energy coursing through.

I really like this idea, give the health bars some flare while you're reworking them. As a jungle otp i'd really appreciate something like this. Same with dragon and baron, it's a really good idea, +1.
Visually it looks a bit extra? or too much? but i like the concept of bigger chunks of the health going at once for bigger hits.
The new healthbar is a bit too dark IMO.

I think they look ok, but my biggest annoyance is at the bottom of the hp bar(if you have color blind on) it looks like there's an odd yellow bar at the bottom placed horizontal, it doesn't seem like the exact color of the actual health, and it just seems super off.

I like and dislike it for certain reasons.

Like- It makes it look like I'm doing a lot more damage (which as a Talon player is always fun)

Dislike- The style is different than League... If you look at the map's style compared to the health bars it looks like they came from a whole different game.
